description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are to prevent, detect, and respond to the threat posed by COVID-19 and strengthen national systems for public health preparedness in the Republic of Albania.

condition.narrative: PCU. To facilitate the carrying out of the Project, the Borrower, through MoH, shall operate and maintain throughout theimplementation of the Project, a Project Coordination Unit (PCU) with functions, staffing, and responsibilities satisfactory to theBank, as set forth in the Project Operational Manual.POM. No later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date, the Borrower,through MoH shall adopt, and thereafter carry out the Project in accordance with, a manual (the Project Operational Manual,satisfactory to the Bank containing, inter alia: (i) specific provisions on detailed arrangements for the carrying out of theProject, (ii) the composition and responsibilities of the PCU; (iii) the procurement, financial management and disbursementrequirements thereof; (iv) personal data collection and processing requirements in accordance with good international practices;(v) the performance indicators; and (vi) the Anti-Corruption Guidelines.Retroactive Financing. Notwithstanding the provisions ofPart A above, no withdrawal shall be made for payments made prior to the Signature Date, except that withdrawals up to an aggregateamount not to exceed Euro 6 million may be made for payments made prior to this date but on or after March 9, 2020, for EligibleExpenditures.
